title: Tracfone | Motorola Moto g Play 2024 | Locked | 64GB | 5000mAh Battery | 50MP Quad Pixel Camera | 6.5-in. HD+ 90Hz Display | Sapphire Blue
description: Turn up the excitement without losing function with the moto g Play from Tracfone.

Feel the blazing-fast power of every tap, swipe and scroll with the new Snapdragon® 680 processor. Indulge your ears with Dolby Atmos® and Hi-Res Audio. Take every photo like a pro – day or night – with Quad Pixel Photo Night Vision, capturing three different exposure values with 4x better low-light sensitivity. And make every selfie spectacular with an 8MP front camera, Face Retouch and background blur. Have a ton of photos, videos and music? The moto g Play has you covered with up to 64GB of storage – add a microSD card for 1TB more. And with up to 46 hours of battery life.
To activate this device, a Tracfone plan is required. To find the Tracfone Plans available to purchase, please go to our TF - Amazon Brand Page linked below the product title.
